com.cs301w01.meatload.model.gallery

Class AlbumGallery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.model.gallery.GalleryData
      • com.cs301w01.meatload.model.gallery.AlbumGallery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AlbumGallery
extends GalleryData
implements java.io.Serializable
    Mediates between the GalleryActivity and the DBManager by creating HashMaps of pictures to be displayed in the Gallery View.

    Can be constructed using an album name as a String or a Collection of tags as Strings.

    Author:
    Isaac Matichuk
    See Also:
    SQLiteDBManager, GalleryActivity, Serialized Form

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Album getAlbum(Context context)
      Returns the Album object represented by albumID in the current AlbumGallery.
      java.util.Collection<Picture> getPictureGallery(Context context)
      Invokes the DBManager to return a set of Picture objects based on whether GalleryManager was contructed with an album name or a set of tags.
      java.lang.String getTitle(Context context)
      Creates a title to display in the Gallery Activity based on the type of Gallery
      boolean isAlbum()
      Returns a boolean specifying whether the current AlbumGallery represents a valid album in the database.
